short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stephen Curry wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Stephen Curry background. Stephen Curry wallpaper theme for NBA fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Cycle through Stephen Curry wallpapers with each new tab.
2. Choose a random Stephen Curry background or set a favorite via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Seamless navigation to More Themes.
12. One-click sharing to social media.
13. Direct download options for wallpapers.
14. Instant play access for games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Stephen Curry new tab.
